Class Fabric

java.lang.Object
com.needleandstitch.pavuk.model.Fabric
@Entity public class Fabric extends Object
An entity class for fabric.

This class serves as a model for the fabric table in the database.

Since:
15.12.2024
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Needle & Stitch
